name: Fluffy Microwave Scrambled Eggs
author: Diana71
summary: Light and fluffy scrambled eggs are easy to make when at home or traveling! Everyone will love this quick energy bite to start the day. Top with pepper and shredded cheese, if desired!
directions: Break the eggs into a microwave-proof mixing bowl
Add milk and salt; mix well
Pop the bowl into the microwave and cook on high power for 30 seconds
Remove bowl, beat eggs very well, scraping down the sides of the bowl, and return to the microwave for another 30 seconds
Repeat this pattern, stirring every 30 seconds for up to 2 1/2 minutes
Stop when eggs have the consistency you desire
